abstract.p: Correction: May 21 New York Stock Exchange tables erroneously showed Friday's activity rather than week's

block.p: New York Stock Exchange tables in the Money & Business section on Sunday reflected an erroneous trading period. They showed Friday's activity rather than the week's. Readers wishing the correct version may write to Money & Business Tables, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036-3959, or telephone (212) 556-4128. E-mail: sunfin@nytimes.com. (Include a postal address.)

New York Stock Exchange tables in the Money & Business section on Sunday reflected an erroneous trading period. They showed Friday's activity rather than the week's.
